commit.message:
sched-vis.c (MAX_VISUAL_NO_UNIT): Define.


        * sched-vis.c (MAX_VISUAL_NO_UNIT): Define.
        (vis_no_unit): Use it.
        (visualize_no_unit): Add the insn only if room exists.
